synopsis.text: In March 1995, Mikiya Kokutou meets a mysterious girl named Shiki Ryougi and falls in love with her. They are reunited the next month at their high school entrance ceremony. Meanwhile, a series of bizarre murders with no clear motive or connections between victims rattles the city. Over the next few years, Mikiya and Shiki grow closer, as he learns about her unique upbringing and she slowly opens up to him. However, Shiki keeps parts of herself guarded. Mikiya also discovers that Shiki has another personality named "SHIKI" residing within her. Through his cousin's work, Mikiya gains insight into the murder investigation that is unfolding in the city. He becomes concerned for Shiki's safety and begins monitoring her actions. In doing so, he stumbles upon a frightening truth that changes his life forever. Three years after first meeting Shiki, Mikiya finally uncovers an astonishing secret about her link to the murders. Their connection is tested as Mikiya grapples with what he has learned while still caring deeply for Shiki.
